{{cpp/filesystem/path/title|root_directory}}
{{cpp/filesystem/path/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
path root_directory() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Returns the root directory of the generic-format path. If the path (in generic format) does not include root directory, returns {{c|path()}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The root directory of the path.

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::filesystem;

int main()
{
    fs::path p = fs::current_path();
    
    std::cout &lt;&lt; "The current path " &lt;&lt; p &lt;&lt; " decomposes into:\n"
              &lt;&lt; "root name " &lt;&lt; p.root_name() &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "root directory " &lt;&lt; p.root_directory() &lt;&lt; '\n'
              &lt;&lt; "relative path " &lt;&lt; p.relative_path() &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
The current path "C:\Users\abcdef\Local Settings\temp" decomposes into:
root name "C:"
root directory "\"
relative path "Users\abcdef\Local Settings\temp"
}}
